task.title: Create a Post
task.shortdesc: A full-screen composer displays a preview of your post on each social network while you’re crafting it.

taskbody.context: The Composer displays a preview of your post on each social network while you’re crafting it.

step.cmd: Click New Post in the top-right corner of the dashboard.
Once the composer is open, click Minimize.png at any time to visit other areas of the dashboard and resume your post later.
If you're looking for the legacy composer, it can be found in the New Post drop-down menu. Click the green arrow, and then select Open Legacy Composer.
